description.value:
The Fourier Synthesizer web component is an interactive waveform and sound generator based on Fourier synthesis.

## Layout
The size of the synthesizer will by default be as large as possible within the web page. You can use CSS width and height properties and/or page layout to control the size if necessary.
```html
<fourier-synth style="width: 800px;"></fourier-synth>
```

attributes.name: audio-label
attributes.description: Text for the enable audio control label.

attributes.name: auto-adjust
attributes.description:
Automatically adjust the gain and DC offset (cos0) to match the wave.
This doubles computational effort and therefore impacts performance by ~50%.

attributes.name: auto-adjust-label
attributes.description: Text for the auto adjust control label.

attributes.name: axes-color
attributes.description: Color of graph background lines and dots. Use a CSS color value.

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description: Background color of graph. Use a CSS color value.

attributes.name: cos-prefix
attributes.description: Text for the cosine control prefix.

attributes.name: cos-title
attributes.description: Title text for the cosine controls.  Set text empty to hide the title.

attributes.name: dc-label
attributes.description: Text for the DC (cos0) control label. HTML can be used e.g. `A<sub>0</sub>`.

attributes.name: dividers-label
attributes.description: Text for the dividers display control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: endpoints-label
attributes.description: Text for the endpoints display control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: fundamental
attributes.description: The fundamental frequency of the fourier wave.

attributes.name: fundamental-label
attributes.description: Text for the fundamental control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: gain-label
attributes.description: Text for the gain control label.

attributes.name: graph-label
attributes.description: Text for the graph display control label.

attributes.name: grid-dots-label
attributes.description: Text for the grid dots display control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: harmonics
attributes.description: Number of harmonics to control and produce.

attributes.name: harmonics-label
attributes.description: Text for the harmonics control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: hide-dividers
attributes.description: Don't display the fundamental wave divider lines.

attributes.name: hide-endpoints
attributes.description: Don't display the fundamental wave endpoint dots.

attributes.name: hide-graph
attributes.description: Don't display the graph.

attributes.name: hide-grid-dots
attributes.description: Don't display the graph background dots.

attributes.name: hide-offset
attributes.description: Don't display the graph DC offset line.

attributes.name: line-color
attributes.description: Color of the waveform plot line. Use a CSS color value.

attributes.name: line-width
attributes.description: The width of the waveform plot line.

attributes.name: line-width-label
attributes.description: Text for the line width control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: main-title
attributes.description: Text for the main title. Set the text empty to hide the title.

attributes.name: max-harmonics
attributes.description:
Limit of the number of harmonics. The actual highest possible number of harmonics
is based on the frequency. The highest possible harmonic frequency is 20000Hz. At
the lowest fundamental 20Hz there can therefore be up to 1000 harmonics. High values
can crash, hang, or otherwise bring the browser to a halt. USE WITH CAUTION.

attributes.name: offset-color
attributes.description: Color of the graph DC offset line and waveform endpoint dots. Use a CSS color value.

attributes.name: offset-label
attributes.description: Text for the offset display control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: periods
attributes.description: Number of fundamental wave periods to display in the graph. From 1 to 5.

attributes.name: periods-label
attributes.description: Text for the periods control label. Set the text empty to hide the control.

attributes.name: reset-text
attributes.description: Text for the reset button.

attributes.name: sin-prefix
attributes.description: Text for the sine control prefix.

attributes.name: sin-title
attributes.description: Title text for the sine controls. Set text empty to hide the title.
